thread.title: High-tech pursuit of Austin bomber can’t explain motive

title: High-tech pursuit of Austin bomber can’t explain motive
text:
High-tech pursuit of Austin bomber can’t explain motive 11:03am GMT - 01:34 
Federal investigators are combing through the Texas home of 23-year-old bombing suspect, Mark Conditt, in a search for answers. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
